name: Oh Yeah
description:
This is not a simple Lianlian game, not the same pattern can be eliminated. Before the game, please click the question mark interface to understand the matching pattern of the graphics, which is conducive to your faster expansion of the game.
Perhaps you do not need to understand the matching pattern through the question mark interface, then you need to use your imagination to generate the match you think you can in your mind, so that the pattern in the game interface can be eliminated faster. After the ordinary pattern matching is eliminated, the corresponding game coins will be obtained, and with the unlocking of subsequent girls, the game coin value will be increased accordingly each time. In addition to the ordinary pattern, there are also three special pattern matches. After the special pattern is successfully matched, you can complete a heartbeat value increase, and after the heartbeat value is full, you can achieve a critical strike, which also acts on the girl on the right and the progress bar below the game area. After this progress bar is topped for the first time, the girl can become clear and the interactive mode button is also opened. Interact with your hands and lips, and get a vocal response. After the progress bar is topped up for the second time, you can get a larger image of the girl, through the upper right corner of the set button under the replacement button, click the magnifying glass in the album to view. On the far right side of the interface is the heartbeat progress bar, which can be reached through interaction or obtained directly through purchase. After the heart value is full, the match of any pattern in the game can increase the heartbeat value, which can let you get a new girl more quickly. Until the heartbeat value completely returns to zero, the game pattern returns to normal matching. Unlocking the girl behind will require more game coins, so the stronger your pattern matching ability, the more beneficial to the promotion of the game and the acquisition of game coins.
Then it depends on how much imagination you have and how many girls you have in your heart. Take action, in the game, exercise your logical pattern judgment ability, and through the interaction with the girls, get more joy, promote you to continue to explore their secrets.
